cab.content: bis DOCUMENT is THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY!S GOVERNMENT). I C R E T.).CABINET.IRAQ, 1,'Po 214 (25).DRAFT OF PROFOSED TELEGRAM TO SIR P, COX.(Circulated by the Secretary of State for the Colonies).His Majesty's Government have decided to adopt policy recommended in.report of Cabinet Committee on Iraq dated 23rd March, copy of which was sent to you semi-officially by mail of 5th April, You may inform Feisal accordingly and consult with him as to best method of making decision public. You should, telegraph to me text of proposed announcement before it is actually made, with a view to simultaneous publication here and in Iraq.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W, 26th April, 1923,
